alert.note: Alert for Pierce; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 9:19PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota and Wisconsin... St Croix River at Stillwater affecting Washington, St. Croix and Pierce Counties. .Widespread flooding continues on area rivers. Additional rainfall from today and into Friday will keep river flows increased. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Croix River at Stillwater. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, HWY 95 between Afton and Bayport begins to flood. Lakefront Park bathhouse in Hudson affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 800 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 88.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 800 PM CDT Thursday was 88.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 90.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 87.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 89.7 feet on 04/14/1952. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
